column4: pepsi : you need to unload usb modules to be able to use your usb port under vmware. You should try to enable the usb port in vmware, then it's tell you a module is already using them. Then as root, type rmmod xxxx to unload the modules.
he wants to release the usb port so vmware can use them
pepsi :to find out whats wrong with ur usb key, plug the usb key, then type dmesg in a console... you should be able to see what's wrong
to be honest, i didnt try, but it works on my desktop
